law.catch_line: Except in a proceeding by the State or any of its political subdivisions, the acceptance of articles...
law.text:
Except in a proceeding by the State or any of its political subdivisions, the acceptance of articles of revival for record by the Department is conclusive evidence of:
The payment of all fees, taxes, unemployment insurance contributions, and reimbursement payments required to be paid;
The filing of all reports required to be filed; and
The revival of the charter of the corporation.
